Title: S7 Ep. 318 Shaping Orlando’s Startup Ecosystem with Rosangela Parker
Description:
In this exciting episode of The Intern Whisperer Podcast, we welcome Rosangela Parker, Program Manager at Plug and Play Tech Center, to discuss her journey into the startup ecosystem and how she’s driving innovation in Orlando. Rosangela shares her experience in fostering Smart Cities, exploring AI’s role in startups, and how Plug and Play accelerates the growth of small businesses. With insights on the evolving startup ecosystem, the importance of mentorship, and her thoughts on the future of AI, this episode is a must-listen for entrepreneurs and innovators alike. Tune in for valuable advice on navigating the world of smart cities and technology.

Key Takeaways:

  • Innovating Orlando: Rosangela highlights the rapid growth of Orlando's startup ecosystem, especially within smart cities, energy, sustainability, and mobility.
  • The Role of AI in Startups: AI can drive efficiency and innovation, allowing startups to maximize limited resources.
  • Mentorship in the Startup World: Emphasizing the importance of mentorship, Rosangela encourages aspiring entrepreneurs to get involved, share their expertise, and be part of the next generation of innovators.
  • Plug and Play's Impact: Rosangela explains how Plug and Play is revolutionizing startup ecosystems by offering tailored resources, mentorship, and connections with investors.
